DataElement.preferredName: Tumor/Lesion Identification Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Progressive or Recurrent Disease Anatomic Site Prior Radiation Therapy Administered Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication of whether the site of relapse/progression previously been irradiated.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tumor/Lesion Identification Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Progressive or Recurrent Disease Anatomic Site Prior Radiation Therapy Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the tumor/lesion identification domain.:The anatomic site(s) at which a disease has progressed or recurred._An indicator that a person previously received radiation treatment for the same condition._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the tumor/lesion identification domain.

Concepts.definition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the tumor/lesion identification domain.

Property.preferredName: Progressive or Recurrent Disease Anatomic Site Prior Radiation Therapy Administered
Property.preferredDefinition: The anatomic site(s) at which a disease has progressed or recurred._An indicator that a person previously received radiation treatment for the same condition._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.longName: Progressive or Recurrent Disease Anatomic Site
Concepts.definition: The anatomic site(s) at which a disease has progressed or recurred.
An indicator that a person previously received radiation treatment for the same condition.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
